statements: SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE id = 1;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date FROM attendance WHERE participant_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY workshop_date ASC;
SELECT participant_name, workshop_name FROM attendance WHERE id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance WHERE workshop_name = 'Databases Workshop';
SELECT id, participant_name, workshop_name, workshop_date FROM attendance WHERE workshop_name = 'Workshop A'
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY workshop_date DESC
SELECT participant_name, CONCAT(participant_name, ' - ', workshop_name) AS participant_workshop FROM attendance WHERE id = 3
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance WHERE workshop_name IN ('Workshop A', 'Workshop B')
SELECT DISTINCT workshop_name FROM attendance ORDER BY workshop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM attendance ORDER BY date_attended DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, workshop_id FROM attendance WHERE workshop_id = 1;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_type FROM workshops WHERE workshop_type = 'Technical';
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendee_id = 3 AND workshop_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT workshop_type FROM workshops;
SELECT * FROM attendance JOIN workshops ON attendance.workshop_id = workshops.workshop_id
SELECT attendee_id, workshop_name, date_attended FROM attendance JOIN workshops ON attendance.workshop_id = workshops.workshop_id WHERE date_attended > '2022-01-01'
SELECT attendee_id, workshop_name, workshop_type FROM attendance JOIN workshops ON attendance.workshop_id = workshops.workshop_id ORDER BY attendee_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(workshop_id) AS workshop_count, workshop_type FROM attendance JOIN workshops ON attendance.workshop_id = workshops.workshop_id GROUP BY workshop_type
SELECT workshop_id, workshop_name FROM workshops WHERE workshop_type = 'Full-Day Workshop'
SELECT * FROM workshops;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date FROM workshops ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_location FROM workshops WHERE workshop_duration > 3;
SELECT workshop_name, COUNT(attendance_id) AS attendees FROM workshops w JOIN attendance a ON w.workshop_id = a.workshop_id GROUP BY workshop_name;
SELECT * FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date FROM workshops ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, attendance_status FROM participants JOIN attendance ON participants.participant_id = attendance.participant_id WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';

SELECT workshop_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS num_participants FROM workshops JOIN attendance ON workshops.workshop_id = attendance.workshop_id GROUP BY workshop_name HAVING num_participants > 5 ORDER BY num_participants DESC;
SELECT * FROM Workshop;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor FROM Workshop WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(workshop_id) AS max_id FROM Workshop;
SELECT participant_name, email, phone_number FROM Participant ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT workshop_name, participant_name, rating FROM Workshop w JOIN WorkshopFeedback wf ON w.workshop_id = wf.workshop_id JOIN Participant p ON wf.participant_id = p.participant_id WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM WorkshopFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT participant_name, email, phone_number FROM Participant WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor, workshop_date FROM Workshop WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT w.workshop_name, p.participant_name, wf.rating FROM Workshop w JOIN WorkshopFeedback wf ON w.workshop_id = wf.workshop_id JOIN Participant p ON wf.participant_id = p.participant_id;

SELECT wf.feedback_text, w.workshop_name, p.participant_name FROM WorkshopFeedback wf JOIN Workshop w ON wf.workshop_id = w.workshop_id JOIN Participant p ON wf.participant_id = p.participant_id WHERE w.workshop_date = '2022-12-15';
SELECT * FROM workshops;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor_name FROM workshops WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM classes ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT workshop_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM attendance GROUP BY workshop_id;
SELECT workshop_name, instructor_name, location FROM workshops
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 1
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM workshops
SELECT workshop_name, instructor_name, workshop_date FROM workshops ORDER BY workshop_date DESC
SELECT p.participant_name, c.class_name FROM participants p INNER JOIN class_participants cp ON p.participant_id = cp.participant_id INNER JOIN classes c ON c.class_id = cp.class_id
